data.name: AUSEHRSetToN
data.value: The AUSEHR Flag has been set to 'N' for this Patient indicating this Patient does not have a PCEHR.

data.name: DatabaseError
data.value: Database error in {0}, please check SystemErrorLog

data.name: DemographicsNotAllowedForThisService
data.value: This service does not allow a patient identifier of Demographic type

data.name: HospitalNotFound
data.value: No hospital was found with the given code and code system.

data.name: HospitalPatientNotFound
data.value: The patient has no MRN at the given hospital.

data.name: HpiiNotSupplied
data.value: HL7 message does not contain a Health Provider's HPI-I. Document cannot be uploaded to the PCEHR

data.name: HpiiNotValid
data.value: Health Provider's HPI-I is not valid. Document cannot be uploaded to the PCEHR

data.name: IhiLengthNot16
data.value: The IHI for this patient had the wrong length and cannot be used to access the PCEHR.

data.name: IhiNotSupplied
data.value: No IHI was found for this patient and so the PCEHR cannot be accessed.

data.name: IhiRecordStatusNotVerified
data.value: The IHI for this patient is not verified and cannot be used to access the PCEHR.

data.name: IhiStatusDemographicMismatch
data.value: There is an unresolved alert of type 'Demographic Mismatch' for this patient. PCEHR cannot be accessed until this alert is resolved.

data.name: IhiStatusDuplicateIhi
data.value: There is an unresolved alert of type 'Duplicate IHI' for this patient. PCEHR cannot be accessed until this alert is resolved.

data.name: IhiStatusDuplicatePatient
data.value: There is an unresolved alert of type 'Duplicate Patient' for this patient. PCEHR cannot be accessed until this alert is resolved.

data.name: IhiStatusExpired
data.value: The IHI for this patient is expired and cannot be used to access the PCEHR.

data.name: IhiStatusMedicareDvaChangeMismatch
data.value: There is an unresolved alert of type 'Medicare/DVA Change Mismatch' for this patient. PCEHR cannot be accessed until this alert is resolved.

data.name: IhiStatusMergeConflict
data.value: The IHI for this patient conflicted with the IHI of another patient with which this patient was merged, and cannot be used to access the PCEHR.

data.name: IhiStatusNotHandled
data.value: HIPS encountered an unexpected IHI status.

data.name: IhiStatusResolved
data.value: The IHI for this patient is resolved and cannot be used to access the PCEHR.

data.name: IhiStatusRetired
data.value: The IHI for this patient is retired and cannot be used to access the PCEHR.

data.name: IhiStatusServiceUnavailable
data.value: The IHI for this patient requires validation but the HI Service was not available. Please try the operation again.

data.name: IhiStatusUnknown
data.value: The IHI for this patient is invalid and cannot be used to access the PCEHR.

data.name: InvalidSex
data.value: The sex of this patient was not recognised.

data.name: LogoNotSupplied
data.value: Document references logo file {0} which was not supplied and there was no logo configured in the Hospital table.

data.name: LogoTooLarge
data.value: Organisational logo for hospital {0} with size {1}x{2} pixels exceeds the 400x100 limit for uploading to PCEHR.

data.name: MrnNotFound
data.value: No patient was found with the given MRN.

data.name: MultipleOrderingProvidersExist
data.value: There is more than one Ordering Provider. The document cannot be uploaded.

data.name: NameNotSupplied
data.value: The name of this patient was not supplied.

data.name: PatientMasterIdNotFound
data.value: No patient was found with the given patient master identifier.

data.name: PCEHRNotDisclosed
data.value: The Patients PCEHR has not been advertised or disclosed. The Report cannot be uploaded.

data.name: StatePatientIdNotFound
data.value: No patient was found with the given enterprise patient identifier.

data.name: UnableToGetEpisode
data.value: The admission at {0} for the patient {1} at {2} could not be found. Check that this is the correct Patient Identifier.

data.name: UnableToGetHospitalList
data.value: Database access failed when populating the list of hospitals.

data.name: UnableToGetPatientMaster
data.value: Database access failed when retrieving patient record.

data.name: UnableToInsertPatientStub
data.value: Database access failed when creating patient record.

data.name: UnknownPatientIdentifierType
data.value: A patient identifier of unknown type was supplied.

data.name: VisitorHospitalNotFound
data.value: Vistor Hospital for hospital code {0} with HospitalId {1} not found.

data.name: VisitorHospitalNotFoundByCode
data.value: Visitor Hospital for hospital code {0} with code system {1} not found.

data.name: HpiiLengthNot16
data.value: The HPI-I for this Health Provider has the wrong length and cannot be used to access the PCEHR

data.name: HealthProviderNotFound
data.value: No Health Provider record was found for the local provider indentifier. The Report cannot be uploaded to the PCEHR

data.name: MultiplePrimaryIdentifiersFound
data.value: The HL7 Message contains multiple Primary Identfiers. The Report cannot be uploaded to the PCEHR

data.name: HealthProviderNameNotSupplied
data.value: The HL7 message does not contain the Health Provider's Family Name. The Report cannot be uploaded.

data.name: ErrorUnableToAddOrEditLocalProvider
data.value: (ERROR) Unable to add or edit local provider

data.name: ErrorUnableToDeactivateLocalProvider
data.value: (ERROR) Unable to deactivate local provider

data.name: ExistingProviderWithHPIIFound
data.value: An existing provider with the specified HPI-I was found.

data.name: UnableToListLocalProviders
data.value: Database access failed when populating the list of local providers.

data.name: InvalidUserDetails
data.value: Invalid user details

data.name: MissingUserValues
data.value: Missing user values

data.name: AUSEHRNotValid
data.value: The AUSEHR Flag has been set to an invalid value. Check the AUSEHR Flag is correct.
